channel.title: Server help probly simple but i still need help
channel.description: o i just made a new server and stuff but it always says server status offline what do I need to do so that other people see that my 317 server is online do i need to open up hamachi and make sure its always on do i need to have my commands prompt thingy on etc... any help would be much appreciated also my classes are all messed up because when i try to open them they look like this Êþº¾ 2 Î 7 t u v w x y z { z | 6 } ~  its like not even our language any ideas on a solution to this? My last problem is making my source and server into a downloadable client so that other people cant see the character files and such so that they cant make themselves mods and such you know just your average downloadable client what im trying to say is I want them to be able to play my client but not have the power of ownership like me u get it kinda???
